title: Leading deodorant brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Brands.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 98.0 is found at Brand Male Lynx and the minimum is found at Female Dove where Brand is 57.6.
The maximum Brand Male Lynx has got 1.7 times higher Sales in million GBP than the minimum Brand Female Dove.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Male Lynx has the highest Sales in million GBP and Female Dove has the lowest Sales in million GBP.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Brands.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 98.0 is found at Brand Male Lynx and the minimum is found at Female Dove where Brand is 57.6.
The maximum Brand Male Lynx has got 1.7 times higher Sales in million GBP than the minimum Brand Female Dove.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Brand Male Lynx and lowest at Brand Female Dove.
Brand Female Sure has the second highest value for Sales in million GBP.
The difference of Sales in million GBP between the highest and lowest Brand is 40.4.
The lowest value 57.6 at Female Dove is almost 1.28 times smaller than the average value 76.4.
Summing up the values of all Brands, we get total 229.2.
